channel.title: Comments on: TFS Release Management: Create Release via REST API
channel.description: A blog about things I learn at the keyboard: DevOps, CI/CD, Cloud, Automation, to name a few....

item.title: By: Sreekanth
item.dc:creator: Sreekanth
item.description:
Hi sir,
This is really nice content in VSTS but i have some doubts in this which is listed below. 1. Where can we define ReleaseDefination Name? 2. I have created one release definition with the specific version. can you please explain how can i trigger that release with powershell from another release definition?
item.content:encoded:
Hi sir,

This is really nice content in VSTS but i have some doubts in this which is listed below.
1. Where can we define ReleaseDefination Name?
2. I have created one release definition with the specific version. can you please explain how can i trigger that release with powershell from another release definition?
